title: What's cancelled in N.B. because of COVID-19
description: The spread of COVID-19 worldwide has forced a number of closures and cancellations in New Brunswick.They include major events, such as the Fredericton ITF Challenger, a tennis event that was expected to be hosted in Fredericton next week.And the Quebec Major …
